A unique multifunctional tool will replace as many as 15 hair care products for you. Light cream spray PERFECT HAIR 15 in 1 has amazing properties: it perfectly moisturizes and nourishes the hair, gives smoothness, returns softness, eliminates the effect of fluffiness, facilitates combing, prevents hair section, restores damage, has thermal protection, facilitates styling and protects the color of dyed hair, enhancing their brightness. This irreplaceable product saturates the hair with keratin, seals the hair, has an antioxidant effect, increases their elasticity and returns the natural volume and unsurpassed shine and strength to the hair. Just one tool will make your hair truly perfect! How to use: apply to washed and towel-dried hair in the required amount (depending on their length, condition and porosity). Distribute the product with a comb along the entire length, including the tips. Without washing off, start styling your hair.
